thread.title: The New York Times is shipping Google Cardboard to its print subscribers
thread.title_full: The New York Times is shipping Google Cardboard to its print subscribers - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: The New York Times is shipping Google Cardboard to its print subscribers
text:
The New York Times has become the latest media outlet to launch its own virtual reality app — and it's doing so by shipping out Google Cardboard viewers to anyone who gets the paper delivered to their homes. Today, the Times and Google announced NYT VR, a platform that will deliver a series of virtual reality short films over the coming year.
The NYT VR app for iOS and Android will launch on November 5th, and on the weekend of November 7th and 8th, over a million headsets will go out to print subscribers — we haven't confirmed whether that includes every single print subscriber, but the Times recently announced that it had 1.1 million of them, so the numbers line up. The app's first film will be "The Displaced," which follows the lives... »
